Credit Line: Ford Motor Company Collection, Gift of Ford Motor Company and John C. Waddell, 1987
Description: Busby Berkeley's choreography for the show-stopping "Lullaby of Broadway" in The Gold Diggers of 1935 is famous for the jazzy complexity and precision tap dancing of one hundred performers in simultaneous movement.  The stars of the film, Dick Powell and Wini Shawm are the only patrons in the lavish nightclub portrayed in this publicity still.
